titleStmt.title: Some observations on the late dangerous petition presented to the House of Commons, September 11. 1648.
titleStmt.author: Walwyn, William, 1600-1681, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to William Walwyn. Not included in McMichael and Taft, The writings of William Walwyn.
A reprinting of and reply to a petition included within: To the right honourable, and supreame authority of this nation, the Commons in Parliament assembled.
"To the right honourable, and supreame authority of this nation, the Commons in Parliament assembled" = Thomason E.464[19*].
Annotation on Thomason copy E.464[19]: "Sept ye 19"; annotation on Thomason copy E.464[19*]: "7ber 19th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
